com.ibm.disni.verbs

类 RdmaCm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.disni.verbs.RdmaCm
  • 直接已知子类:
    RdmaCmNat

    public abstract class RdmaCm
extends Object
    The RDMA connection management (CM) interface.

    • 字段详细资料

      • RDMA_PS_IPOIB

        public static final short RDMA_PS_IPOIB
        Unsupported.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • RDMA_PS_TCP

        public static final short RDMA_PS_TCP
        Provides reliable, connection-oriented QP communication. Unlike TCP, the RDMA port space provides message, not stream, based communication.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • RDMA_PS_UDP

        public static final short RDMA_PS_UDP
        Unsupported
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • open

        public static RdmaCm open()
                   throws IOException
        Open the connection management (CM) interface.
        返回:
        the actual CM interface.
        抛出:
        Exception - if no implementation exists.
        IOException

      • createEventChannel

        public abstract RdmaEventChannel createEventChannel()
                                             throws IOException
        Asynchronous events are reported to users through event channels. Event channels are used to direct all events on an RdmaCmId. For many clients, a single event channel may be sufficient, however, when managing a large number of connections or id's. users may find it useful to direct events for different id's to different channels for processing. All created event channels must be destroyed by calling destroyEventChannel. Users should call getCmEvent to retrieve events on an event channel.
        返回:
        the rdma event channel
        抛出:
        Exception - the exception
        IOException

      • createId

        public abstract RdmaCmId createId(RdmaEventChannel cmChannel,
                                  short rdma_ps)
                           throws IOException
        Creates an identifier that is used to track communication information. RdmaCmId's are conceptually equivalent to a socket for RDMA communication. The difference is that RDMA communication requires explicitly binding to a specified RDMA device before communication can occur, and most operations are asynchronous in nature. Asynchronous communication events on an id are reported through the associated event channel. Users must release the id by calling destroyCmId.
        参数:
        cmChannel - the communication channel that events associated with the allocated RdmaCmId will be reported on.
        rdma_ps - the RDMA port space. Only RDMA_PS_TCP supported.
        返回:
        the newly created Id
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • createQP

        public abstract IbvQP createQP(RdmaCmId id,
                               IbvPd pd,
                               IbvQPInitAttr attr)
                        throws IOException
        Allocate a QP associated with the specified RdmaCmId and transition it for sending and receiving. The RdmaCmId must be bound to a local RDMA device before calling this function, and the protection domain must be for that same device. QPs allocated to an id are automatically transitioned by the librdmacm through their states. After being allocated, the QP will be ready to handle posting of receives. If the QP is unconnected, it will be ready to post sends.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        pd - the protection domain.
        attr - the attr.
        返回:
        the actual QP.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • bindAddr

        public abstract void bindAddr(RdmaCmId id,
                              SocketAddress addr)
                       throws IOException
        Associates a source address with an RdmaCmId. The address may be wildcarded. If binding to a specific local address, the RdmaCmId will also be bound to a local RDMA device.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        addr - local address information.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • listen

        public abstract void listen(RdmaCmId id,
                            int backlog)
                     throws IOException
        Initiates a listen for incoming connection requests. The listen will be restricted to the locally bound source address.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        backlog - the backlog of listen call.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • resolveAddr

        public abstract void resolveAddr(RdmaCmId id,
                                 SocketAddress src,
                                 SocketAddress dst,
                                 int timeout)
                          throws IOException
        Resolve destination and optional source addresses from IP addresses to an RDMA address. If successful, the specified RdmaCmId will be bound to a local device.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        src - source address information.
        dst - destination address information
        timeout - time to wait for resolution to complete.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • resolveRoute

        public abstract void resolveRoute(RdmaCmId id,
                                  int timeout)
                           throws IOException
        Resolves an RDMA route to the destination address in order to establish a connection. The destination address must have already been resolved by calling resolveAddr.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        timeout - time to wait for resolution to complete.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • getCmEvent

        public abstract RdmaCmEvent getCmEvent(RdmaEventChannel cmChannel,
                                       int timeout)
                                throws IOException
        Retrieves a communication event. If no events are pending, by default, the call will block until an event is received. All events that are reported must be acknowledged by calling ackCmEvent.
        参数:
        cmChannel - event channel to check for events.
        返回:
        information about the next communication event.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • connect

        public abstract void connect(RdmaCmId id,
                             RdmaConnParam connParam)
                      throws IOException
        For an RdmaCmId of type RDMA_PS_TCP, this call initiates a connection request to a remote destination. Users must have resolved a route to the destination address by having called resolveRoute before calling this method. The following properties are used to configure the communication and specified by the connParam parameter when connecting.

        private_data: a user-controlled data buffer. The contents of the buffer are copied and transparently passed to the remote side as part of the communication request.

        private_data_len: Specifies the size of the user-controlled data buffer

        initiator_depth: The maximum number of outstanding RDMA read and atomic operations that the local side will have to the remote side.

        flow_control: Specifies if hardware flow control is available. This value is exchanged with the remote peer and is not used to configure the QP. Applies only to RDMA_PS_TCP.

        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        connParam - connection parameters. See above for details.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • accept

        public abstract void accept(RdmaCmId id,
                            RdmaConnParam connParam)
                     throws IOException
        Called from the listening side to accept a connection. The following properties are used to configure the communication and specified by the connParam parameter when connecting.

        private_data: a user-controlled data buffer. The contents of the buffer are copied and transparently passed to the remote side as part of the communication request.

        private_data_len: Specifies the size of the user-controlled data buffer

        initiator_depth: The maximum number of outstanding RDMA read and atomic operations that the local side will have to the remote side.

        flow_control: Specifies if hardware flow control is available. This value is exchanged with the remote peer and is not used to configure the QP. Applies only to RDMA_PS_TCP.

        参数:
        id - the connection identifier associated with the request
        connParam - Information needed to establish the connection. See above for details.
        抛出:
        Exception - the exception
        IOException

      • ackCmEvent

        public abstract int ackCmEvent(RdmaCmEvent cmEvent)
        All events which are allocated by getCmEvent must be released, there should be a one-to-one correspondence between successful gets and acks.
        参数:
        cmEvent - the event to be released.
        返回:
        return 0 on success, 1 on failure.

      • disconnect

        public abstract int disconnect(RdmaCmId id)
                        throws IOException
        Disconnects a connection and transitions any associated QP to the error state. Flushes any posted work requests to the completion queue. This routine may be called by both the client and server side of a connection. After successfully disconnecting, an RDMA_CM_EVENT_DISCONNECTED event will be generated on both sides of the connection.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        返回:
        returns 0 on success.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • destroyEventChannel

        public abstract int destroyEventChannel(RdmaEventChannel cmChannel)
                                 throws IOException
        Release all resources associated with an event channel.
        参数:
        cmChannel - The communication channel to destroy.
        返回:
        returns 0 on success.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • destroyCmId

        public abstract int destroyCmId(RdmaCmId id)
                         throws IOException
        Destroys the specified RdmaCmId and cancels any outstanding asynchronous operation.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier to be destroyed.
        返回:
        return 0 on success.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • destroyQP

        public abstract int destroyQP(RdmaCmId id)
                       throws IOException
        Destroy a QP allocated on the RdmaCmId.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        返回:
        returns 0 on success.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • getSrcAddr

        public abstract SocketAddress getSrcAddr(RdmaCmId id)
                                  throws IOException
        Returns the local IP address for an RdmaCmId that has been bound to a local device.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        返回:
        the local IP address for an RdmaCmId that has been bound to a local device.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • getDstAddr

        public abstract SocketAddress getDstAddr(RdmaCmId id)
                                  throws IOException
        Returns the remote IP address associated with an RdmaCmId.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier.
        返回:
        the SocketAddress address of the connected peer. If the RdmaCmId is not connected the call returns NULL.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • destroyEp

        public abstract int destroyEp(RdmaCmId id)
                       throws IOException
        Destroys the specified RdmaCmId and all associated resources.
        参数:
        id - the RDMA identifier
        返回:
        return 0 on success
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure
        IOException
